ygData.subject: Re: Archmage Answers
ygData.msgSnippet: Q: Are there enhanced effects for these songs when the proper instrument is equipped? In the case of Aquatic Ayre, is the enhancement range increased? For
ygData.messageBody:
Q: Are there enhanced effects for these songs when the proper instrument is
equipped? In the case of Aquatic Ayre, is the enhancement range increased?
For Sirens and Pixie Strike, does it increased duration, chance of success,
or both?

A: Instruments only effect the primary effects of the song (healing, buff,
attack speed, etc.) - not the range/duration/chance of success, etc.

Is it just me or does this seem like a general answer meaning "all songs",
not just the ones in question. Take Lament for example. It is played on a
stringed instrument. If instruments do not effect duration/chance of
success then what is left to effect on this song? What bonus do we get
when using a lute/mandolin?



At 08:49 AM 2/4/00 -0500, you wrote:
